title: Cruel World
description: Revenge, Hate, and Desire, all of them are very dangerous.But this is what is running in the blood of Theo Grey since he marries Sarah.He wants to ruin her like she ruins the life of some he loved.She will suffer.She will be his pawn.He will get his revengeAnd show her the Cruel world where she will live.
author: Hanna Bans
